summary: NHTSA#THE MOLDED PLASTIC PIN WHICH CONNECTS THE UPPER STEERING COLUMN SHAFT AND THE LOWER COLUMN SHAFT MAY HAVE BEEN SHEARED PRIOR TO INSTALLATION OF THE STEERING COLUMN ASSEMBLY INTO THE VEHICLE.  IF THIS OCCURRED, THE UPPER STEERING SHAFT WILL SEPARATE FROM THE LOWER STEERING SHAFT.  THE CONSUMER HAS THE SAME PROBLEM.  HOWEVER THIS VEHICLE WAS NOT UNDER RECALL DUE TO  VIN.   *AK   THE DRIVER LOST CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE WHEN THE STEERING COLUMN FAILED.  IT WAS DISCOVERED AT THE GARAGE THAT THE STEERING COLUMN HAD COME APART AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.   *SCC  *JB
